name: 結華の友達１
text: 三峰ちゃんお疲れ～
trans: Yooo, Mitsumine-chan!

name: 結華
text: お疲れ！
trans: Heeey!

name: 結華の友達２
text: 今日も元気にお仕事ー？
trans: Working hard today?

name: 結華
text: おかげさまで
trans: Yup, thanks for asking.

name: 結華の友達２
text:
ほんと働くねぇ……体調とか気をつけなよー？
板書も代返も全然やるから！
trans:
You really are getting busy... You sure you're taking
care of yourself? I can take notes for you in class
and fill in for your job if you want!

name: 結華の友達１
text: 優しい悪い友達じゃん
trans: You're a poor example of a good friend.

name: 結華の友達２
text:
優しいんだからいいでしょ
──もちろん、空いてる日も募集中！
trans:
But I'm being nice about it, though.
──And at least, I'm still trying to get her to join us.

name: 結華
text:
ごめんね
いっつも誘ってくれてるのに
trans:
Sorry... I know you keep asking for me,
but I can't go right now.

name: 結華
trans: ──Ah.

name: 結華の友達２
text: おっ、どこかある！？
trans: Okay then, so when are you free!?

name: 結華
text:
あー……金曜だったら、夕方空いてるんだけど……
でもふたりとも遅い授業なかったよね……？
trans:
Uhh... I'll be free Friday evening...
We don't have an evening class that day, right?

name: 結華の友達１
text: ないけど全然
trans: I don't think so.

name: 結華の友達２
text:
うんうん！　待ってる！
ケーキとパフェどっちがいい？
trans:
Yay! I'll be waiting!
Should we go for cake or go for parfait?

name: 結華
text: そしたらふたりが食べたい方で！
trans: I'll let you two pick!

name: off
text: もう、胸を張って言える
trans: I can finally say it proudly.

name: 結華
text: 私は、アイドル
trans: I am... an idol.

name: 結華
text: お待たせー！
trans: Sorry I took so long!

name: プロデューサー
text: おう、お疲れ様
trans: That's okay.

name: プロデューサー
text:
悪いな……
終わって急いで出てきてもらう感じだっただろ
trans:
It's me who should be sorry...
I had you rush out here as soon as class was done...

name: 結華
text:
まぁそうだけど、全然全然
お迎え来てもらう分で補って余りあるし！
trans:
Well, it's not like I have a problem with that.
You did come all this way to pick me up, after all!

name: 結華
text: 感謝してます、プロデューサー
trans: So I appreciate the gesture, Producer.

name: プロデューサー
text: はは、ありがたく受け取っておくよ
trans: Haha, I'll take your word for it.

name: プロデューサー
text: 車、こっちだ
trans: The car's right over here.

name: 結華
text: おっけー
trans: Okay～

name: プロデューサー
text:
──そういえば
ちょっと打ち合わせが必要な仕事があるんだけど……
trans:
──By the way, we'll need to attend a meeting
for your next job...

name: 結華
text:
！
ど、どこか空き時間使う……！？
trans:
!
R-Right, I guess I should see when I'm available.

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん、そうしてもらえるとありがたい
でもどこにするかは結華が決めて大丈夫だよ
trans:
Yeah, please do that, but I'll leave it up to you
when you're free to do it.

name: プロデューサー
text: 無理なのは？
trans: So what days aren't you available for?

name: 結華
text:
あは、金曜日はパスで……
今さっき約束してきた……
trans:
Heehee, can't it do it on Friday...
I've already made plans...

name: プロデューサー
text:
了解
お友達と楽しんでな！
trans:
Understood.
Have fun with your friends!

name: 結華
text: ……うん
trans: I will!

name: 結華
text:
まさか自分の身に起こるなんて
思っていなかった夢みたいな話
trans:
I never would have thought this would happen to me.
What I've only thought of as a dream...

name: 結華
text: それが、今の私の当たり前
trans: ...has now become part of my life.
